title: Red Lobster restaurants in the U.S. and Canada 2013
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of restaurants, containing a total of 14 data points.
In general Number of restaurants has rose over the Year.
Number of restaurants is gradually increasing from 2000 to 2004, roughly constant from 2004 to 2008, slightly increasing from 2008 to 2012, and lastly roughly constant from 2012 to 2013.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2008 and 2009.
The highest Number of restaurants, of value 705.0 was reached at Year 2013
Minimum Number of restaurants about 654.0 was reached at Year 2000
